messages.content: NX_PromptStyler is a custom node for ComfyUI that creates a prompt based on a list of keywords saved in CSV files.
What was the inspiration for NX_PromptStyler?
NX_PromptStyler was inspired by PCMonsterx's ComfyUI-CSV-Loader and modifications and additions made by Adel AI.
Which operating systems has NX_PromptStyler been tested on?
NX_PromptStyler has been tested only on Linux, but it should work without any problems on Windows and Mac.
NX_PromptStyler can be installed by cloning the repository into the custom_nodes subfolder using GIT or by downloading the ZIP file and unzipping it into the custom_nodes folder.
In which category will NX_PromptStyler be available in ComfyUI after installation?
After installation, NX_PromptStyler will be available in the NX_Nodes category in ComfyUI.
How are CSV files detected and classified by NX_PromptStyler?
NX_PromptStyler detects CSV files placed in the CSV subfolder and classifies them in a predetermined order, with additional files listed in alphabetical order.
What are the requirements for CSV files used with NX_PromptStyler?
CSV files used with NX_PromptStyler must be encoded in UTF-8, include a header line consisting of name, prompt, and negative_prompt, and use a comma as a separator and double quotes as a delimiter.
NX_PromptStyler allows users to select or ignore categories, assign positive or negative weights to each category, manage presets, and display generated prompts before starting image generation.
